itemDisplayName: Create a NCBI BLAST+ and MUMmer compute machine that can run average_nucleotide_identity.py
description: This template creates an NCBI BLAST+ and MUMmer compute image extended with the average_nucleotide_identity.py script to run the FNA analysis. The system has a custom script included for naming consistency of analisis of DNA segments. The input and output are gathered from CIFS shares.
summary: Create a NCBI BLAST+ MUMmer compute machine.
